__e: You are the girl .. who stood beside me yesterday. When I first saw your mother's portrait. The girl who spoke softly and sweetly.
I was just looking for sympathy and for someone to be on my side, and you've always been on my side, so I sent that picture.
I have not from your eyes that gentleness and show of love as I was wont to have.
My career's not going too badly at the moment, since you were kind enough to ask.
But you were so kind to come and see me. I have to tell you the truth, as unpleasant as it may be:
Would you be good enough, sir, though, to explain to my audience that I have never seen these cuffs before, and this is the first time we've ever attempted this?
Remember that kindness is a weapon men use to get what they want.
You've been very gentle with me, and gentleness is the best gift anyone can give.
Now, you see, graciousness is something you clearly know nothing about.
Yes, it is, but it is just the sort of kindness I would expect from him.
You were always so kind. A kindness you can see in the eyes.
He certainly hasn't got his father's good nature, that is true.
